1) The husband is an asshole who neglects and insults his wife. 2) The kid isn't a bad person, he knew he raped her and he was all apologetic and he's keeping up with his school work. 3) The wife loved the kid more than her own husband because she felt happy and more satisfied with him. 4) The kid and the former housewife are living happily together. ||| This doujin is not a bad NTR, it reminds me of 248318. Also, when reading or watching NTR, remember that it is fictional and the characters are drawings and that the story has been scripted with a storyboard. Of course, there are depressing NTRs that stab you right through the heart... steer clear of those ones and so you should always read the tags, the comments, 
and have a quick look through before you read or watch the NTR

I'm really liking Kurosu Gatari's NTR series. Sure, this one started in a fucked up way, but the ending is wholesome-ish, which is pretty rare for an NTR in my opinion. But I do think that the sequel is a much superior story than this one.
